item.title: Tweet
item.description: Jesus fucking Christ. I was willing to give the whole season 2 of #starTrekDiscovery the benefit of the doubt, but e13 was literally people just standing around tearfully staring through the lens flare. Fuck dark star trek, Fuck sweary, ‘sexy’ star trek. ToS and TNG FTW. ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
